content: at 22 double_crochet double_crochet 2x into next double_crochet 2x double_crochet into next 44 double_crochet double_crochet 2x into next double_crochet 2x double_crochet into the next 22 double_crochet slip to join do not turn round 11 chain 2 and double_crochet into next 22 double_crochet counting chain there should at 23 double_crochet double_crochet 2x into next double_crochet 2x double_crochet into next 46 double_crochet double_crochet 2x into next double_crochet 2x double_crochet into the next 23 double_crochet slip to join do not turn cut yarn and tie off decide if you want crocheted pockets or knitted ones pick up stitches for either from the back of row 10 make sure not to go all the way through the stitches so the pockets are invisible form the outside use only 1 stand of yarn for this part pockets will look like long flaps at this stage using the sitch marker to center pick up 12 stitches for one pocket and either knit single_crochet or double_crochet until you feel it is big enough do the same on the other side with 20 stitches i knit my pockets for 25 row in stocking stitch feel free to add more stitches if you would like bigger pockets bind off and cut yarn the rest of the bag is crochet each round even at this point as you go around the bag each time to come to the first or last stitch that a pocket was picked up from you will attach part of the pocket as follows on single_crochet rounds pull loop up in next space stick hook through side stitch of pocket yo and pull though all 3 loops on double_crochet round yo and pull up a loop in next stitch making sure that you put the hook through the pocket at the height the row is yo and pull through 3 loops yo and pull though remaining 2 loops \ follow pattern bellow attaching pockets when necessary when pockets are fully attached continue in pattern as normal round 12 chain 1 single_crochet even slip to join do not turn round 13 chain 2 double_crochet even slip to join do not turn round 14 chain 2 double_crochet even slip to join do not turn round 15 chain 2 double_crochet even slip to join do not turn round 16 chain 1 single_crochet even slip to join do not turn round 17 chain 2 double_crochet even slip to join do not turn round 18 chain 2 double_crochet even slip to join do not turn round 19 chain 2 double_crochet even slip to join do not turn round 20 21 22 chain 1 single_crochet even slip to join do not turn round 23 x stitch chain 2 not counting chain as spaces double_crochet into 2nd space double_crochet into skipped space con t all the way around the row slip to join round 24 chain 2 double_crochet even slip to join do not turn round 25 at this point you have to decide where you want your handles to sit mark stitches
